name: Heartless & Dreadful: Return By 72 Hours (Demo)
description:
Supported languages:

-English

-Russian

-Japanese (Japanese is Machine translation. Sorry.)

Bugs: To be expected. But I tried to squash as many as possible.

-

In the world of darkness. There is an interesting being...

A being that hosts a tournament for the strong. They call it The Dark Lord.

For what purpose does it host a tournament? Who knows. Some say it enjoys the sight of young blood being spilled. Some say it is for some other, unknown motives.

Obviously The Dark Lord knew that no one would simply go ahead and spill their blood for him... so he offered a reward.

A wish. Anything the winning team could wish for, will be granted to each of it's members.

Shamir, one of the leading demon lords and his small team, Dominika and Kair have been on a streak, steadily getting closer to their goal... Ever since they've heard of the tournament they have been working on hard on being on top.

Everything has been going well... Until...

-

Authors's note:

Welcome. Thanks for stopping by. This is a game I have been working for. It's been inspired by multiple game series that I am deeply in love with. So you will likely spot a lot of similarities to some action games out there. (Mainly Devil May Cry).

Either way. I hope you will enjoy what I have so far.

-

Future:

This project has been in developement for a few long months, I work on it during my spare time as I have a normal daytime job. I feel like it is polished enough to be showcased to the world... Hopefully you'll enjoy what I have so far.

This is simply a demo. A full game is being in developement and will be sold on Steam in the future.

I shall not disclose the scope of the game as everything is a subject to change, but don't expect anything extremely big. Have fun!

-

Demo:

The demo contains 2 levels, and first 20 floors of the Tower Of Blood.

-

Gamepad:

360/Xone/XOX Partially supported, only during the gameplay for now. Full implementation will be done in the final release of the game.

-
